Book.Name: GraphSym

TitlePage.Title: &GraphSym;
TitlePage.Subtitle: &GraphSym; Graphs with Symmetries library
TitlePage.Author: Rhys J. Evans rhysjevans00@gmail.com https://rhysje00.github.io/
Antonio Montero antonio.montero@fmf.uni-lj.si https://anteromontonio.github.io/
Primož Potočnik primoz.potocnik@fmf.uni-lj.si https://users.fmf.uni-lj.si/potocnik/work.htm
TitlePage.Copyright:
License ©right; 2024 by Rhys J. Evans, Antonio Montero and Primož Potočnik
The &GraphSym; package is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the https://www.fsf.org/licenses/gpl.html as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
TitlePage.Acknowledgements: The &GraphSym; package is based largely on the I/O functionality found in the &DIGRAPHS; package (homepage: https://digraphs.github.io/Digraphs/). The content of this package has been extracted directly from the https://graphsym.net/ of Primož Potočnik, and is based on the work of himself, https://www.math.auckland.ac.nz/~conder/, https://en.unimib.it/pablo-spiga, https://profiles.auckland.ac.nz/g-verret, and https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Steve-Wilson-12.
